title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 70 - Appeals From Minimum Wage Orders And Regulations Under Sections 657 And 676 Of Labor Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 70 - Appeals From Minimum Wage Orders And Regulations Under Sections 657 And 676 Of Labor Law

State Regulations
§ 70.0 - Repealed
§ 70.1 - Application
§ 70.2 - How appeal to be commenced; time
§ 70.3 - Form and contents of petition
§ 70.4 - Service of petition on commissioner of labor for answer
§ 70.5 - Answer to petition; time for answer; contents of answer; service and filing of answer; filing transcript of records
§ 70.6 - Inspection of record
§ 70.7 - Oral arguments; briefs
§ 70.8 - Intervention
§ 70.9 - Amendment of pleadings to conform to proof
§ 70.10 - Security for stay (subdivisions 3 and 8 of sections 657 and 676)
§ 70.11 - Waiver of security (subdivisions 7 of sections 657 and 676)
§ 70.12 - Decision of board; time

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 70

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §
100[5]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
